Name: Parlor
About the game: Parlor is an interactive party game that can be played with your Twitch chat ! You as a streamer provide clues to your chat so they can guess the answer by typing it to your chat. TWO GAME MODES TELL ME Streamer is allowed to talk without saying certain words to give clues to the chat. SHOW ME Streamer only gives physical clues to the chat. Talking is not allowed. In each mode, your chat tries to guess the answer by typing it to your chat, competing with each other. Parlor is available in multiple languages with more coming soon! Have an interactive fun with your chat and show your remarkable vocabulary skills! Please note that you need to have a Twitch account to play the game.
